810 void MmwDemo_ADCBufOpen(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj)
811 {
812  ADCBuf_Params ADCBufparams;
813  /*****************************************************************************
814  * Start ADCBUF driver:
815  *****************************************************************************/
816  /* ADCBUF Params initialize */
817  ADCBuf_Params_init(&ADCBufparams);
818  ADCBufparams.chirpThreshold = 1;
819  ADCBufparams.continousMode = 0;
820 
821  /* Open ADCBUF driver */
822  obj->adcbufHandle = ADCBuf_open(0, &ADCBufparams);
823  if (obj->adcbufHandle == NULL)
824  {
825  //System_printf("Error: Unable to open the ADCBUF driver\n");
826  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
827  return;
828  }
829  //System_printf("Debug: ADCBUF Instance(0) %p has been opened successfully\n", obj->adcbufHandle);
830 }

833 
839 int32_t MmwDemo_ADCBufConfig(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *dataPathObj)
840 {
841 
842  ADCBuf_dataFormat dataFormat;
843  ADCBuf_RxChanConf rxChanConf;
844  uint8_t channel;
845  int32_t retVal = 0;
846  uint8_t numBytePerSample = 0;
847  MmwDemo_ADCBufCfg* ptrAdcbufCfg;
848  uint32_t chirpThreshold;
849  uint32_t rxChanMask = 0xF;
850 
851  ptrAdcbufCfg = &dataPathObj->cliCfg->adcBufCfg;
852 
853  /* Check if ADC configuration is supported:*/
854  /* ADC out bits: must be 16 Bits */
855  MmwDemo_debugAssert(gMmwMCB.cfg.openCfg.adcOutCfg.fmt.b2AdcBits == 2);
856 
857  /* ADC data format: must be complex */
858  /*adcCfg command*/
859  if((gMmwMCB.cfg.openCfg.adcOutCfg.fmt.b2AdcOutFmt != 1) &&
860  (gMmwMCB.cfg.openCfg.adcOutCfg.fmt.b2AdcOutFmt != 2))
861  {
862  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
863  }
864  /*adcbufCfg command*/
865  MmwDemo_debugAssert(ptrAdcbufCfg->adcFmt == 0);
866 
867  /* ADC channel interleave mode: must be interleaved */
868  MmwDemo_debugAssert(ptrAdcbufCfg->chInterleave == 0);
869 
870 
871  /*****************************************************************************
872  * Disable all ADCBuf channels
873  *****************************************************************************/
874  if ((retVal = ADCBuf_control(dataPathObj->adcbufHandle, ADCBufMMWave_CMD_CHANNEL_DISABLE, (void *)&rxChanMask)) < 0)
875  {
876  //System_printf("Error: Disable ADCBuf channels failed with [Error=%d]\n", retVal);
877  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
878  goto exit;
879  }
880 
881  /* Complex dataFormat has 4 bytes */
882  numBytePerSample = 4;
883 
884  /* Configure ADC buffer data format */
885  dataFormat.adcOutFormat = ptrAdcbufCfg->adcFmt;
886  dataFormat.sampleInterleave = ptrAdcbufCfg->iqSwapSel;
887  dataFormat.channelInterleave = ptrAdcbufCfg->chInterleave;
888 
889  /* Debug Message: */
890  /*System_printf("Debug: Start ADCBuf driver dataFormat=%d, sampleSwap=%d, interleave=%d, chirpThreshold=%d\n",
891  dataFormat.adcOutFormat, dataFormat.sampleInterleave, dataFormat.channelInterleave,
892  ptrAdcbufCfg->chirpThreshold);*/
893 
894  retVal = ADCBuf_control(dataPathObj->adcbufHandle, ADCBufMMWave_CMD_CONF_DATA_FORMAT, (void *)&dataFormat);
895  if (retVal < 0)
896  {
897  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
898  goto exit;
899  }
900 
901  memset((void*)&rxChanConf, 0, sizeof(ADCBuf_RxChanConf));
902 
903  /* Enable Rx Channel indicated in channel configuration */
904  for (channel = 0; channel < SYS_COMMON_NUM_RX_CHANNEL; channel++)
905  {
906  if(gMmwMCB.cfg.openCfg.chCfg.rxChannelEn & (0x1<<channel))
907  {
908  /* Populate the receive channel configuration: */
909  rxChanConf.channel = channel;
910  retVal = ADCBuf_control(dataPathObj->adcbufHandle, ADCBufMMWave_CMD_CHANNEL_ENABLE, (void *)&rxChanConf);
911  if (retVal < 0)
912  {
913  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
914  goto exit;
915  }
916  rxChanConf.offset += dataPathObj->numAdcSamples * numBytePerSample;
917  }
918  }
919 
920  chirpThreshold = ptrAdcbufCfg->chirpThreshold;
921 
922  /* Set the chirp threshold: */
923  retVal = ADCBuf_control(dataPathObj->adcbufHandle, ADCBufMMWave_CMD_SET_CHIRP_THRESHHOLD,
924  (void *)&chirpThreshold);
925  if(retVal < 0)
926  {
927  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
928  }
929 
930 exit:
931  return retVal;
932 }
933 
945 void MmwDemo_EDMA_CQTransferCompletionCallbackFxn(uintptr_t arg,
946  uint8_t transferCompletionCode)
947 {
948  MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj = (MmwDemo_DataPathObj *)arg;
949 
950  switch (transferCompletionCode)
951  {
952  case MMW_EDMA_RXSAT_TRANSFER_COMPLETION:
953  /* Chained EDMA channels complete on 2nd EDMA channel */
954  if(obj->datapathCQ.anaMonCfg->sigImgMonEn)
955  {
956  obj->datapathCQ.sigImgBandEdmaCnt++;
957  MmwDemo_debugAssert(*(uint8_t *)obj->datapathCQ.sigImgData <= obj->datapathCQ.sigImgMonCfg->numSlices);
958  }
959  if(obj->datapathCQ.anaMonCfg->rxSatMonEn)
960  {
961  obj->datapathCQ.rxSatEdmaCnt++;
962  MmwDemo_debugAssert(*(uint8_t *)obj->datapathCQ.rxSatData <= obj->datapathCQ.rxSatMonCfg->numSlices);
963  }
964 
965  break;
966 
967  default:
968  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
969  break;
970  }
971 }

983 int32_t MmwDemo_dataPathConfigCQEdma(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj)
984 {
985  uint32_t eventQueue;
986  int32_t retVal = 0;
987  uint16_t aCnt;
988 
989  /*****************************************************
990  * EDMA configuration for getting CQ data from CQ buffer
991  * to Datapath CQ storage
992  *****************************************************/
993  /* Use event queue 1 for CQ because when event queue 0 is used for CQ
994  and LVDS streaming is enabled (LVDS streaming uses event queue 0)
995  then there is data corruption on the saved CQ data that is EDMAed below.
996  Problem being investigated.*/
997  eventQueue = 1U;
998 
999  /*
1000  EDMA configurations for 2 chained EDMA channels:
1001  sigImgMonEn = 1, rxSatMonEn = 1,
1002  acnt: sigImgMonTotalSize, satMonTotalSize
1003  sigImgMonEn = 1, rxSatMonEn = 0,
1004  acnt: sigImgMonTotalSize, 0
1005  sigImgMonEn = 0, rxSatMonEn = 1,
1006  acnt: 0, satMonTotalSize
1007  */
1008  if(obj->datapathCQ.anaMonCfg->sigImgMonEn)
1009  {
1010  aCnt = obj->datapathCQ.sigImgMonTotalSize;
1011  }
1012  else
1013  {
1014  /* This becomes a dummy paRAM set */
1015  aCnt = 0;
1016  }
1017 
1018  /* Configure EDMA channel for sigImg monitor */
1019  retVal = EDMAutil_configSyncAwithChaining(obj->edmaHandle,
1020  (uint8_t *)(SOC_translateAddress((uint32_t)obj->datapathCQ.sigImgMonAddr,SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,NULL)),
1021  (uint8_t *)(SOC_translateAddress((uint32_t)obj->datapathCQ.sigImgData,SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,NULL)),
1022  EDMA_TPCC0_REQ_DFE_CHIRP_AVAIL,
1023  MMW_EDMA_CH_RX_SATURATION_MON,
1024  true,
1025  EDMA_TPCC0_REQ_DFE_CHIRP_AVAIL,
1026  aCnt,
1027  1,
1028  0,
1029  0,
1030  eventQueue,
1031  false, /*isFinalTransferInterruptEnabled */
1032  true, /* isFinalChainingEnabled */
1033  NULL,
1034  (uintptr_t) NULL);
1035 
1036  if (retVal != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
1037  {
1038  return -1;
1039  }
1040 
1041  if(obj->datapathCQ.anaMonCfg->rxSatMonEn)
1042  {
1043  aCnt = obj->datapathCQ.satMonTotalSize;
1044  }
1045  else
1046  {
1047  /* This becomes a dummy paRAM set */
1048  aCnt = 0;
1049  }
1050 
1051  /* Configure EDMA channel for RX saturation monitor */
1052  retVal = EDMAutil_configSyncAwithChaining(obj->edmaHandle,
1053  (uint8_t *)(SOC_translateAddress((uint32_t)obj->datapathCQ.satMonAddr,SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,NULL)),
1054  (uint8_t *)(SOC_translateAddress((uint32_t)obj->datapathCQ.rxSatData,SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,NULL)),
1055  MMW_EDMA_CH_RX_SATURATION_MON,
1056  MMW_EDMA_CH_RX_SATURATION_MON,
1057  false,
1058  MMW_EDMA_CH_RX_SATURATION_MON,
1059  aCnt,
1060  1,
1061  0,
1062  0,
1063  eventQueue,
1064  true, /*isFinalTransferInterruptEnabled */
1065  false, /* isFinalChainingEnabled */
1066  MmwDemo_EDMA_CQTransferCompletionCallbackFxn,
1067  (uintptr_t) obj);
1068  if (retVal != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
1069  {
1070  return -1;
1071  }
1072  return 0;
1073 }
1074 
1084 int32_t MmwDemo_dataPathConfigCQ(MmwDemo_DataPathObj * ptrDataPathObj)
1085 {
1086  ADCBuf_CQConf cqConfig;
1087  rlRxSatMonConf_t* ptrSatMonCfg;
1088  rlSigImgMonConf_t* ptrSigImgMonCfg;
1089  MmwDemo_AnaMonitorCfg* ptrAnaMonitorCfg;
1090  int32_t retVal;
1091 
1092  /* Get analog monitor configuration */
1093  ptrAnaMonitorCfg = &ptrDataPathObj->cliCommonCfg->anaMonCfg;
1094 
1095  /* Config mmwaveLink to enable Saturation monitor - CQ2 */
1096  ptrSatMonCfg = &ptrDataPathObj->cliCommonCfg->cqSatMonCfg[ptrDataPathObj->validProfileIdx];
1097 
1098  if (ptrAnaMonitorCfg->rxSatMonEn)
1099  {
1100  retVal = mmwDemo_cfgRxSaturationMonitor(ptrSatMonCfg);
1101  if(retVal < 0)
1102  {
1103  System_printf ("Error: rlRfRxIfSatMonConfig returns error = %d\n", retVal);
1104 
1105  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
1106  }
1107  }
1108 
1109  /* Config mmwaveLink to enable Signal Image band monitor - CQ1 */
1110  ptrSigImgMonCfg = &ptrDataPathObj->cliCommonCfg->cqSigImgMonCfg[ptrDataPathObj->validProfileIdx];
1111 
1112  if (ptrAnaMonitorCfg->sigImgMonEn)
1113  {
1114  retVal = mmwDemo_cfgRxSigImgMonitor(ptrSigImgMonCfg);
1115  if(retVal < 0)
1116  {
1117  System_printf ("Error: rlRfRxIfSatMonConfig returns error = %d\n", retVal);
1118 
1119  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
1120  }
1121  }
1122 
1123  /* Config CQ */
1124  if ((ptrAnaMonitorCfg->rxSatMonEn) || (ptrAnaMonitorCfg->sigImgMonEn))
1125  {
1126  /* CQ driver config */
1127  memset((void *)&cqConfig, 0, sizeof(ADCBuf_CQConf));
1128  cqConfig.cqDataWidth = 0; /* 16bit for mmw demo */
1129 
1130  /* CQ1 starts from the beginning of the buffer, address should be 16 bytes aligned */
1131  cqConfig.cq1AddrOffset = MMW_DEMO_CQ_SIGIMG_ADDR_OFFSET;
1132  cqConfig.cq2AddrOffset = MMW_DEMO_CQ_RXSAT_ADDR_OFFSET; /* address should be 16 bytes aligned. */
1133 
1134  retVal = ADCBuf_control(ptrDataPathObj->adcbufHandle, ADCBufMMWave_CMD_CONF_CQ, (void *)&cqConfig);
1135  if (retVal < 0)
1136  {
1137  System_printf ("Error: Unable to configure CQ, errorCode[%d]\n", retVal);
1138  return -1;
1139  }
1140  }
1141 
1142  /* Save config pointer */
1143  ptrDataPathObj->datapathCQ.rxSatMonCfg = ptrSatMonCfg;
1144  ptrDataPathObj->datapathCQ.sigImgMonCfg = ptrSigImgMonCfg;
1145  ptrDataPathObj->datapathCQ.anaMonCfg= ptrAnaMonitorCfg;
1146 
1147  if (ptrAnaMonitorCfg->sigImgMonEn)
1148  {
1149  /* Save CQ-Signal & Image band energy info in datapath object */
1150  ptrDataPathObj->datapathCQ.sigImgMonAddr = ADCBUF_MMWave_getCQBufAddr(ptrDataPathObj->adcbufHandle,
1151  ADCBufMMWave_CQType_CQ1,
1152  &retVal);
1153  MmwDemo_debugAssert (ptrDataPathObj->datapathCQ.sigImgMonAddr != NULL);
1154 
1155  /* This is for 16bit format in mmw demo */
1156  ptrDataPathObj->datapathCQ.sigImgMonTotalSize = (ptrSigImgMonCfg->numSlices + 1U) * 2U;
1157 
1158  /* Allocate data memory */
1159  ptrDataPathObj->datapathCQ.sigImgData = &gCQRxSigImgMemory;
1160 
1161  }
1162  if (ptrAnaMonitorCfg->rxSatMonEn)
1163  {
1164  /* Save CQ-Rx Saturation info in datapath object */
1165  ptrDataPathObj->datapathCQ.satMonAddr =
1166  ADCBUF_MMWave_getCQBufAddr(ptrDataPathObj->adcbufHandle,
1167  ADCBufMMWave_CQType_CQ2,
1168  &retVal);
1169  MmwDemo_debugAssert (ptrDataPathObj->datapathCQ.satMonAddr != NULL);
1170 
1171  /* This is for 16bit format in mmw demo */
1172  ptrDataPathObj->datapathCQ.satMonTotalSize = ptrSatMonCfg->numSlices + 1U;
1173 
1174  /* Allocate data memory */
1175  ptrDataPathObj->datapathCQ.rxSatData = &gCQRxSatMonMemory;
1176  }
1177 
1178  /* EDMA configuration for CQ */
1179  if ((ptrAnaMonitorCfg->rxSatMonEn) || (ptrAnaMonitorCfg->sigImgMonEn))
1180  {
1181  retVal = MmwDemo_dataPathConfigCQEdma(ptrDataPathObj);
1182  if(retVal < 0)
1183  {
1184  return -1;
1185  }
1186  }
1187  return 0;
1188 }
1189 
1196 bool MmwDemo_parseProfileAndChirpConfig(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *dataPathObj)
1197 {
1198  uint16_t frameChirpStartIdx;
1199  uint16_t frameChirpEndIdx;
1200  int16_t frameTotalChirps;
1201  int32_t errCode;
1202  uint32_t profileLoopIdx, chirpLoopIdx;
1203  bool foundValidProfile = false;
1204  uint16_t channelTxEn = gMmwMCB.cfg.openCfg.chCfg.txChannelEn;
1205  uint8_t channel;
1206  uint8_t numRxAntennas = 0;
1207  uint8_t rxAntOrder [SYS_COMMON_NUM_RX_CHANNEL];
1208  uint8_t txAntOrder [SYS_COMMON_NUM_TX_ANTENNAS];
1209  int32_t i;
1210  int32_t txIdx, rxIdx;
1211 
1212  /* Find number of enabled channels */
1213  for (channel = 0; channel < SYS_COMMON_NUM_RX_CHANNEL; channel++)
1214  {
1215  rxAntOrder[channel] = 0;
1216  if(gMmwMCB.cfg.openCfg.chCfg.rxChannelEn & (0x1<<channel))
1217  {
1218  rxAntOrder[numRxAntennas] = channel;
1219  /* Track the number of receive channels: */
1220  numRxAntennas++;
1221  }
1222  }
1223  dataPathObj->numRxAntennas = numRxAntennas;
1224 
1225  /* read frameCfg chirp start/stop*/
1226  frameChirpStartIdx = gMmwMCB.cfg.ctrlCfg.u.frameCfg.frameCfg.chirpStartIdx;
1227  frameChirpEndIdx = gMmwMCB.cfg.ctrlCfg.u.frameCfg.frameCfg.chirpEndIdx;
1228  frameTotalChirps = frameChirpEndIdx - frameChirpStartIdx + 1;
1229 
1230  /* loop for profiles and find if it has valid chirps */
1231  /* we support only one profile in this processing chain */
1232  for (profileLoopIdx=0;
1233  ((profileLoopIdx<MMWAVE_MAX_PROFILE)&&(foundValidProfile==false));
1234  profileLoopIdx++)
1235  {
1236  uint32_t mmWaveNumChirps = 0;
1237  bool validProfileHasElevation=false;
1238  bool validProfileHasOneTxPerChirp=false;
1239  uint16_t validProfileTxEn = 0;
1240  uint16_t validChirpTxEnBits[32]={0};
1241  MMWave_ProfileHandle profileHandle;
1242 
1243  profileHandle = gMmwMCB.cfg.ctrlCfg.u.frameCfg.profileHandle[profileLoopIdx];
1244  if (profileHandle == NULL)
1245  continue; /* skip this profile */
1246 
1247  /* get numChirps for this profile; skip error checking */
1248  MMWave_getNumChirps(profileHandle,&mmWaveNumChirps,&errCode);
1249  /* loop for chirps and find if it has valid chirps for the frame
1250  looping around for all chirps in a profile, in case
1251  there are duplicate chirps
1252  */
1253  for (chirpLoopIdx=1;chirpLoopIdx<=mmWaveNumChirps;chirpLoopIdx++)
1254  {
1255  MMWave_ChirpHandle chirpHandle;
1256  /* get handle and read ChirpCfg */
1257  if (MMWave_getChirpHandle(profileHandle,chirpLoopIdx,&chirpHandle,&errCode)==0)
1258  {
1259  rlChirpCfg_t chirpCfg;
1260  if (MMWave_getChirpCfg(chirpHandle,&chirpCfg,&errCode)==0)
1261  {
1262  uint16_t chirpTxEn = chirpCfg.txEnable;
1263  /* do chirps fall in range and has valid antenna enabled */
1264  if ((chirpCfg.chirpStartIdx >= frameChirpStartIdx) &&
1265  (chirpCfg.chirpEndIdx <= frameChirpEndIdx) &&
1266  ((chirpTxEn & channelTxEn) > 0))
1267  {
1268  uint16_t idx = 0;
1269  for (idx=(chirpCfg.chirpStartIdx-frameChirpStartIdx);idx<=(chirpCfg.chirpEndIdx-frameChirpStartIdx);idx++)
1270  {
1271  validChirpTxEnBits[idx] = chirpTxEn;
1272  foundValidProfile = true;
1273  }
1274 
1275  }
1276  }
1277  }
1278  }
1279  /* now loop through unique chirps and check if we found all of the ones
1280  needed for the frame and then determine the azimuth/elevation antenna
1281  configuration
1282  */
1283  if (foundValidProfile) {
1284  int16_t nonElevFirstChirpIdx = -1;
1285  for (chirpLoopIdx=0;chirpLoopIdx<frameTotalChirps;chirpLoopIdx++)
1286  {
1287  bool validChirpHasElevation=false;
1288  bool validChirpHasOneTxPerChirp=false;
1289  uint16_t chirpTxEn = validChirpTxEnBits[chirpLoopIdx];
1290  if (chirpTxEn == 0) {
1291  /* this profile doesnt have all the needed chirps */
1292  foundValidProfile = false;
1293  break;
1294  }
1295  /* check if this is an elevation TX chirp */
1296  validChirpHasElevation = (chirpTxEn==0x2);
1297  validProfileHasElevation |= validChirpHasElevation;
1298  /* if not, then check the MIMO config */
1299  if (!validChirpHasElevation)
1300  {
1301  validChirpHasOneTxPerChirp = ((chirpTxEn==0x1) || (chirpTxEn==0x4));
1302  /* if this is the first chirp without elevation, record the chirp's
1303  MIMO config as profile's MIMO config. We dont handle intermix
1304  at this point */
1305  if (nonElevFirstChirpIdx==-1) {
1306  validProfileHasOneTxPerChirp = validChirpHasOneTxPerChirp;
1307  nonElevFirstChirpIdx = chirpLoopIdx;
1308  }
1309  /* check the chirp's MIMO config against Profile's MIMO config */
1310  if (validChirpHasOneTxPerChirp != validProfileHasOneTxPerChirp)
1311  {
1312  /* this profile doesnt have all chirps with same MIMO config */
1313  foundValidProfile = false;
1314  break;
1315  }
1316  }
1317  /* save the antennas actually enabled in this profile */
1318  validProfileTxEn |= chirpTxEn;
1319  }
1320  }
1321 
1322  /* found valid chirps for the frame; mark this profile valid */
1323  if (foundValidProfile==true) {
1324  rlProfileCfg_t profileCfg;
1325  uint32_t numTxAntAzim = 0;
1326  uint32_t numTxAntElev = 0;
1327 
1328  dataPathObj->validProfileIdx = profileLoopIdx;
1329  dataPathObj->numTxAntennas = 0;
1330  if (validProfileHasElevation)
1331  {
1332  numTxAntElev = 1;
1333  }
1334  if (!validProfileHasOneTxPerChirp)
1335  {
1336  numTxAntAzim=1;
1337  }
1338  else
1339  {
1340  if (validProfileTxEn & 0x1)
1341  {
1342  numTxAntAzim++;
1343  }
1344  if (validProfileTxEn & 0x4)
1345  {
1346  numTxAntAzim++;
1347  }
1348  }
1349  /*System_printf("Azimuth Tx: %d (MIMO:%d), Elev Tx:%d\n",
1350  numTxAntAzim,validProfileHasMIMO,numTxAntElev);*/
1351  dataPathObj->numTxAntennas = numTxAntAzim + numTxAntElev;
1352  dataPathObj->numVirtualAntAzim = numTxAntAzim * dataPathObj->numRxAntennas;
1353  dataPathObj->numVirtualAntElev = numTxAntElev * dataPathObj->numRxAntennas;
1354  dataPathObj->numVirtualAntennas = dataPathObj->numVirtualAntAzim + dataPathObj->numVirtualAntElev;
1355 
1356  /* Sanity Check: Ensure that the number of antennas is within system limits */
1357  MmwDemo_debugAssert (dataPathObj->numVirtualAntennas > 0);
1358  MmwDemo_debugAssert (dataPathObj->numVirtualAntennas <= (SYS_COMMON_NUM_TX_ANTENNAS * SYS_COMMON_NUM_RX_CHANNEL));
1359 
1360  /* Copy the Rx channel compensation coefficients from common area to data path structure */
1361  if (validProfileHasOneTxPerChirp)
1362  {
1363  for (i = 0; i < dataPathObj->numTxAntennas; i++)
1364  {
1365  txAntOrder[i] = log2Approx(validChirpTxEnBits[i]);
1366  }
1367  for (txIdx = 0; txIdx < dataPathObj->numTxAntennas; txIdx++)
1368  {
1369  for (rxIdx = 0; rxIdx < dataPathObj->numRxAntennas; rxIdx++)
1370  {
1371  dataPathObj->compRxChanCfg.rxChPhaseComp[txIdx*dataPathObj->numRxAntennas + rxIdx] =
1372  dataPathObj->cliCommonCfg->compRxChanCfg.rxChPhaseComp[txAntOrder[txIdx]*SYS_COMMON_NUM_RX_CHANNEL + rxAntOrder[rxIdx]];
1373 
1374  }
1375 
1376  }
1377  }
1378  else
1379  {
1380  cmplx16ImRe_t one;
1381  one.imag = 0;
1382  one.real = 0x7fff;
1383  for (txIdx = 0; txIdx < dataPathObj->numTxAntennas; txIdx++)
1384  {
1385  for (rxIdx = 0; rxIdx < dataPathObj->numRxAntennas; rxIdx++)
1386  {
1387  dataPathObj->compRxChanCfg.rxChPhaseComp[txIdx*dataPathObj->numRxAntennas + rxIdx] = one;
1388  }
1389 
1390  }
1391  }
1392 
1393  /* Get the profile configuration: */
1394  if (MMWave_getProfileCfg(profileHandle,&profileCfg, &errCode) < 0)
1395  {
1396  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
1397  return false;
1398  }
1399 
1400 #ifndef MMW_ENABLE_NEGATIVE_FREQ_SLOPE
1401  /* Check frequency slope */
1402  if (profileCfg.freqSlopeConst < 0)
1403  {
1404  System_printf("Frequency slope must be positive\n");
1405  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
1406  }
1407 #endif
1408 
1409  dataPathObj->numAdcSamples = profileCfg.numAdcSamples;
1410  dataPathObj->numRangeBins = MmwDemo_pow2roundup(dataPathObj->numAdcSamples);
1411  dataPathObj->numChirpsPerFrame = frameTotalChirps *
1412  gMmwMCB.cfg.ctrlCfg.u.frameCfg.frameCfg.numLoops;
1413 
1414  dataPathObj->numAngleBins = MMW_NUM_ANGLE_BINS;
1415  dataPathObj->numDopplerBins = dataPathObj->numChirpsPerFrame/dataPathObj->numTxAntennas;
1416  dataPathObj->numRangeBinsPerTransfer = MMW_NUM_RANGE_BINS_PER_TRANSFER;
1417  dataPathObj->rangeResolution = MMWDEMO_SPEED_OF_LIGHT_IN_METERS_PER_SEC * profileCfg.digOutSampleRate * 1e3 /
1418  (2 * profileCfg.freqSlopeConst * ((3.6*1e3*900)/(1U << 26)) * 1e12 * dataPathObj->numRangeBins);
1419 
1420  dataPathObj->xyzOutputQFormat = (uint32_t) ceil(log10(16./fabs(dataPathObj->rangeResolution))/log10(2));
1421  dataPathObj->dataPathMode = DATA_PATH_WITH_ADCBUF;
1422  dataPathObj->frameStartIntCounter = 0;
1423  dataPathObj->interFrameProcToken = 0;
1424  }
1425  }
1426  return foundValidProfile;
1427 }
1428 
1429 void MmwDemo_measurementResultOutput(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj)
1430 {
1431  /* Send the received DSS calibration info through CLI */
1432  CLI_write ("compRangeBiasAndRxChanPhase");
1433  CLI_write (" %.7f", obj->cliCommonCfg->compRxChanCfg.rangeBias);
1434  int32_t i;
1435  for (i = 0; i < SYS_COMMON_NUM_TX_ANTENNAS*SYS_COMMON_NUM_RX_CHANNEL; i++)
1436  {
1437  CLI_write (" %.5f", (float) obj->cliCommonCfg->compRxChanCfg.rxChPhaseComp[i].real/32768.);
1438  CLI_write (" %.5f", (float) obj->cliCommonCfg->compRxChanCfg.rxChPhaseComp[i].imag/32768.);
1439  }
1440  CLI_write ("\n");
1441 
1442 }
1443 
1467 void MmwDemo_transmitProcessedOutput(UART_Handle uartHandle,
1468  MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj)
1469 {
1470  MmwDemo_output_message_header header;
1471  MmwDemo_GuiMonSel *pGuiMonSel;
1472  uint32_t tlvIdx = 0;
1473  uint32_t i;
1474  uint32_t numPaddingBytes;
1475  uint32_t packetLen;
1476  uint8_t padding[MMWDEMO_OUTPUT_MSG_SEGMENT_LEN];
1477 
1478  MmwDemo_output_message_tl tl[MMWDEMO_OUTPUT_MSG_MAX];
1479 
1480  /* Get Gui Monitor configuration */
1481  pGuiMonSel = &gMmwMCB.cliCfg.guiMonSel;
1482 
1483  /* Clear message header */
1484  memset((void *)&header, 0, sizeof(MmwDemo_output_message_header));
1485  /* Header: */
1486  header.platform = 0xA1443;
1487  header.magicWord[0] = 0x0102;
1488  header.magicWord[1] = 0x0304;
1489  header.magicWord[2] = 0x0506;
1490  header.magicWord[3] = 0x0708;
1491  header.numDetectedObj = obj->numObjOut;
1492  header.version = MMWAVE_SDK_VERSION_BUILD | //DEBUG_VERSION
1493  (MMWAVE_SDK_VERSION_BUGFIX << 8) |
1494  (MMWAVE_SDK_VERSION_MINOR << 16) |
1495  (MMWAVE_SDK_VERSION_MAJOR << 24);
1496 
1497  packetLen = sizeof(MmwDemo_output_message_header);
1498  if (pGuiMonSel->detectedObjects && (obj->numObjOut > 0))
1499  {
1500  tl[tlvIdx].type = MMWDEMO_OUTPUT_MSG_DETECTED_POINTS;
1501  tl[tlvIdx].length = sizeof(MmwDemo_detectedObj) * obj->numObjOut +
1502  sizeof(MmwDemo_output_message_dataObjDescr);
1503  packetLen += sizeof(MmwDemo_output_message_tl) + tl[tlvIdx].length;
1504  tlvIdx++;
1505  }
1506  if (pGuiMonSel->logMagRange)
1507  {
1508  tl[tlvIdx].type = MMWDEMO_OUTPUT_MSG_RANGE_PROFILE;
1509  tl[tlvIdx].length = sizeof(uint16_t) * obj->numRangeBins;
1510  packetLen += sizeof(MmwDemo_output_message_tl) + tl[tlvIdx].length;
1511  tlvIdx++;
1512  }
1513  if (pGuiMonSel->noiseProfile)
1514  {
1515  tl[tlvIdx].type = MMWDEMO_OUTPUT_MSG_NOISE_PROFILE;
1516  tl[tlvIdx].length = sizeof(uint16_t) * obj->numRangeBins;
1517  packetLen += sizeof(MmwDemo_output_message_tl) + tl[tlvIdx].length;
1518  tlvIdx++;
1519  }
1520  if (pGuiMonSel->rangeAzimuthHeatMap)
1521  {
1522  tl[tlvIdx].type = MMWDEMO_OUTPUT_MSG_AZIMUT_STATIC_HEAT_MAP;
1523  tl[tlvIdx].length = obj->numRangeBins * obj->numVirtualAntAzim * sizeof(uint32_t);
1524  packetLen += sizeof(MmwDemo_output_message_tl) + tl[tlvIdx].length;
1525  tlvIdx++;
1526  }
1527  if (pGuiMonSel->rangeDopplerHeatMap)
1528  {
1529  tl[tlvIdx].type = MMWDEMO_OUTPUT_MSG_RANGE_DOPPLER_HEAT_MAP;
1530  tl[tlvIdx].length = obj->numRangeBins * obj->numDopplerBins * sizeof(uint16_t);
1531  packetLen += sizeof(MmwDemo_output_message_tl) + tl[tlvIdx].length;
1532  tlvIdx++;
1533  }
1534  if (pGuiMonSel->statsInfo)
1535  {
1536  tl[tlvIdx].type = MMWDEMO_OUTPUT_MSG_STATS;
1537  tl[tlvIdx].length = sizeof(MmwDemo_output_message_stats);
1538  packetLen += sizeof(MmwDemo_output_message_tl) + tl[tlvIdx].length;
1539  tlvIdx++;
1540  }
1541 
1542  header.numTLVs = tlvIdx;
1543  /* Round up packet length to multiple of MMWDEMO_OUTPUT_MSG_SEGMENT_LEN */
1544  header.totalPacketLen = MMWDEMO_OUTPUT_MSG_SEGMENT_LEN *
1545  ((packetLen + (MMWDEMO_OUTPUT_MSG_SEGMENT_LEN-1))/MMWDEMO_OUTPUT_MSG_SEGMENT_LEN);
1546  header.timeCpuCycles = Pmu_getCount(0);
1547  header.frameNumber = obj->frameStartIntCounter;
1548 
1549 
1550  UART_writePolling (uartHandle,
1551  (uint8_t*)&header,
1552  sizeof(MmwDemo_output_message_header));
1553 
1554  tlvIdx = 0;
1555  /* Send detected Objects */
1556  if ((pGuiMonSel->detectedObjects == 1) && (obj->numObjOut > 0))
1557  {
1558  MmwDemo_output_message_dataObjDescr descr;
1559 
1560  UART_writePolling (uartHandle,
1561  (uint8_t*)&tl[tlvIdx],
1562  sizeof(MmwDemo_output_message_tl));
1563  /* Send objects descriptor */
1564  descr.numDetetedObj = (uint16_t) obj->numObjOut;
1565  descr.xyzQFormat = (uint16_t) obj->xyzOutputQFormat;
1566  UART_writePolling (uartHandle, (uint8_t*)&descr, sizeof(MmwDemo_output_message_dataObjDescr));
1567 
1568  /*Send array of objects */
1569  UART_writePolling (uartHandle, (uint8_t*)obj->objOut, sizeof(MmwDemo_detectedObj) * obj->numObjOut);
1570  tlvIdx++;
1571  }
1572 
1573  /* Send Range profile */
1574  if (pGuiMonSel->logMagRange)
1575  {
1576  UART_writePolling (uartHandle,
1577  (uint8_t*)&tl[tlvIdx],
1578  sizeof(MmwDemo_output_message_tl));
1579 
1580  for(i = 0; i < obj->numRangeBins; i++)
1581  {
1582  UART_writePolling (uartHandle,
1583  (uint8_t*)&obj->rangeDopplerLogMagMatrix[i*obj->numDopplerBins],
1584  sizeof(uint16_t));
1585  }
1586  tlvIdx++;
1587  }
1588 
1589  /* Send noise profile */
1590  if (pGuiMonSel->noiseProfile)
1591  {
1592  uint32_t maxDopIdx = obj->numDopplerBins/2 -1;
1593  UART_writePolling (uartHandle,
1594  (uint8_t*)&tl[tlvIdx],
1595  sizeof(MmwDemo_output_message_tl));
1596 
1597  for(i = 0; i < obj->numRangeBins; i++)
1598  {
1599  UART_writePolling (uartHandle,
1600  (uint8_t*)&obj->rangeDopplerLogMagMatrix[i*obj->numDopplerBins + maxDopIdx],
1601  sizeof(uint16_t));
1602  }
1603  tlvIdx++;
1604  }
1605 
1606  /* Send data for static azimuth heatmap */
1607  if (pGuiMonSel->rangeAzimuthHeatMap)
1608  {
1609  UART_writePolling (uartHandle,
1610  (uint8_t*)&tl[tlvIdx],
1611  sizeof(MmwDemo_output_message_tl));
1612 
1613  UART_writePolling (uartHandle,
1614  (uint8_t *) obj->azimuthStaticHeatMap,
1615  obj->numRangeBins * obj->numVirtualAntAzim * sizeof(uint32_t));
1616 
1617  tlvIdx++;
1618  }
1619 
1620  /* Send data for range/Doppler heatmap */
1621  if (pGuiMonSel->rangeDopplerHeatMap == 1)
1622  {
1623  UART_writePolling (uartHandle,
1624  (uint8_t*)&tl[tlvIdx],
1625  sizeof(MmwDemo_output_message_tl));
1626  UART_writePolling (uartHandle,
1627  (uint8_t*)obj->rangeDopplerLogMagMatrix,
1628  tl[tlvIdx].length);
1629  tlvIdx++;
1630  }
1631 
1632  /* Send stats information */
1633  if (pGuiMonSel->statsInfo == 1)
1634  {
1635  MmwDemo_output_message_stats stats;
1636  stats.interChirpProcessingMargin = 0; /* Not applicable */
1637  stats.interFrameProcessingMargin = (uint32_t) (obj->timingInfo.interFrameProcessingEndMargin/R4F_CLOCK_MHZ); /* In micro seconds */
1638  stats.interFrameProcessingTime = (uint32_t) (obj->timingInfo.interFrameProcCycles/R4F_CLOCK_MHZ); /* In micro seconds */
1639  stats.transmitOutputTime = (uint32_t) (obj->timingInfo.transmitOutputCycles/R4F_CLOCK_MHZ); /* In micro seconds */
1640  stats.activeFrameCPULoad = obj->timingInfo.activeFrameCPULoad;
1641  stats.interFrameCPULoad = obj->timingInfo.interFrameCPULoad;
1642 
1643  UART_writePolling (uartHandle,
1644  (uint8_t*)&tl[tlvIdx],
1645  sizeof(MmwDemo_output_message_tl));
1646  UART_writePolling (uartHandle,
1647  (uint8_t*)&stats,
1648  tl[tlvIdx].length);
1649  tlvIdx++;
1650  }
1651 
1652  /* Send padding bytes */
1653  numPaddingBytes = MMWDEMO_OUTPUT_MSG_SEGMENT_LEN - (packetLen & (MMWDEMO_OUTPUT_MSG_SEGMENT_LEN-1));
1654  if (numPaddingBytes<MMWDEMO_OUTPUT_MSG_SEGMENT_LEN)
1655  {
1656  UART_writePolling (uartHandle,
1657  (uint8_t*)padding,
1658  numPaddingBytes);
1659  }
1660 }
1661 
1670 int32_t MmwDemo_dataPathStart (void)
1671 {
1672  MMWave_CalibrationCfg calibrationCfg;
1673  int32_t errCode = 0;
1674  MmwDemo_DataPathObj *dataPathObj = &gMmwMCB.dataPathObj;
1675 
1676  dataPathObj->frameStartIntCounter = 0;
1677  dataPathObj->interFrameProcToken = 0;
1678 
1679  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwFrameDoneCount = 0;
1680  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.swFrameDoneCount = 0;
1681 
1682  /* Initialize the calibration configuration: */
1683  memset ((void *)&calibrationCfg, 0, sizeof(MMWave_CalibrationCfg));
1684 
1685  /* Populate the calibration configuration: */
1686  calibrationCfg.dfeDataOutputMode = MMWave_DFEDataOutputMode_FRAME;
1687  calibrationCfg.u.chirpCalibrationCfg.enableCalibration = true;
1688  calibrationCfg.u.chirpCalibrationCfg.enablePeriodicity = true;
1689  calibrationCfg.u.chirpCalibrationCfg.periodicTimeInFrames = 10U;
1690 
1691  /* Start the mmWave module: The configuration has been applied successfully. */
1692  if (MMWave_start (gMmwMCB.ctrlHandle, &calibrationCfg, &errCode) < 0)
1693  {
1694  /* Error: Unable to start the mmWave control */
1695  //System_printf ("Error: mmWave Control Start failed [Error code %d]\n", errCode);
1696  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
1697  }
1698  else
1699  {
1700  /* Update data path stop status */
1701  dataPathObj->datapathStopped = false;
1702  }
1703 
1704  return errCode;
1705 }
1706 
1717 /*Unverified code. Conflicts with data path processing and should not be used.*/
1718 void MmwDemo_configLVDSHwData (MmwDemo_DataPathObj *dataPathObj)
1719 {
1720  int32_t errCode;
1721 
1722  /* Delete previous CBUFF HW session if one was configured */
1723  if(gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionHandle != NULL)
1724  {
1725  MmwDemo_LVDSStreamDeleteHwSession(gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionHandle);
1726  }
1727 
1728  /* Configure HW session */
1729  if (MmwDemo_LVDSStreamHwConfig(dataPathObj) < 0)
1730  {
1731  //System_printf("Failed LVDS stream HW configuration\n");
1732  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
1733  return;
1734  }
1735 
1736  /* If HW LVDS stream is enabled, start the session here so that ADC samples will be
1737  streamed out as soon as the first chirp samples land on ADC*/
1738  if(CBUFF_activateSession (gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionHandle, &errCode) < 0)
1739  {
1740  //System_printf("Failed to activate CBUFF session for LVDS stream HW. errCode=%d\n",errCode);
1741  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
1742  return;
1743  }
1744 }
1745 
1756 void MmwDemo_dataPathConfig (void)
1757 {
1758  int32_t retVal = 0;
1759  MmwDemo_DataPathObj *dataPathObj = &gMmwMCB.dataPathObj;
1760 
1761  /* Configure ADCBuf Config and get the valid number of RX antennas
1762  do this first as we need the numRxAntennas in MmwDemo_parseProfileAndChirpConfig
1763  to get the Virtual Antennas */
1764  /* Parse the profile and chirp configs and get the valid number of TX Antennas */
1765  if (MmwDemo_parseProfileAndChirpConfig(dataPathObj) == true)
1766  {
1767 
1768  retVal = mmwDemo_cfgAnalogMonitor(&dataPathObj->cliCommonCfg->anaMonCfg);
1769  if (retVal != 0)
1770  {
1771  System_printf ("Error: rlRfAnaMonConfig returns error = %d\n", retVal);
1772 
1773  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
1774  }
1775 
1776  if (MmwDemo_ADCBufConfig(dataPathObj) < 0)
1777  {
1778  //System_printf("Error: ADCBuf config failed \n");
1779  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
1780  }
1781 
1782  /* Configure CQ */
1783  MmwDemo_dataPathConfigCQ(dataPathObj);
1784 
1785  /* Now we are ready to allocate and config the data buffers */
1786  MmwDemo_dataPathCfgBuffers(dataPathObj, &gMmwL3heap);
1787  /* Configure one-time EDMA and HWA parameters */
1788  MmwDemo_dataPathConfigCommon(dataPathObj);
1789 
1790  /*Delete all valid LVDS stream sessions*/
1791  /*Unverified code. Conflicts with data path processing and should not be used.*/
1792  MmwDemo_LVDSStreamDelete();
1793 
1794  /* Configure LVDS transfer of ADC data */
1795  /*Unverified code. Conflicts with data path processing and should not be used.*/
1796  if(dataPathObj->cliCfg->lvdsStreamCfg.dataFmt != 0)
1797  {
1798  MmwDemo_configLVDSHwData(dataPathObj);
1799  }
1800 
1801  /* Config HWA for 1D processing and keep it ready for immediate processingh
1802  as soon as Front End starts generating chirps */
1803  MmwDemo_config1D_HWA(dataPathObj);
1804  MmwDemo_dataPathTrigger1D(dataPathObj);
1805  }
1806  else
1807  {
1808  /* no valid profile found - assert! */
1809  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
1810  }
1811  return;
1812 }
1813

1824 {
1825  MmwDemo_dataPathObjInit(obj, &gMmwMCB.cliCfg, &gMmwMCB.cliCommonCfg);
1826 
1827  /* Initialize the ADCBUF */
1828  ADCBuf_init();
1829 
1830  /* Initialize HWA */
1831  MmwDemo_hwaInit(obj);
1832 
1833  /* Initialize EDMA */
1834  MmwDemo_edmaInit(obj);
1835 }

1873 void MmwDemo_mmWaveCtrlTask(UArg arg0, UArg arg1)
1874 {
1875  int32_t errCode;
1876 
1877  while (1)
1878  {
1879  /* Execute the mmWave control module: */
1880  if (MMWave_execute (gMmwMCB.ctrlHandle, &errCode) < 0)
1881  {
1882  //System_printf ("Error: mmWave control execution failed [Error code %d]\n", errCode);
1883  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
1884  }
1885  }
1886 }
1887 
1906 int32_t MmwDemo_eventCallbackFxn(uint16_t msgId, uint16_t sbId, uint16_t sbLen, uint8_t *payload)
1907 {
1908  uint16_t asyncSB = RL_GET_SBID_FROM_UNIQ_SBID(sbId);
1909 
1910  /* Process the received message: */
1911  switch (msgId)
1912  {
1913  case RL_RF_ASYNC_EVENT_MSG:
1914  {
1915  /* Received Asychronous Message: */
1916  switch (asyncSB)
1917  {
1918  case RL_RF_AE_CPUFAULT_SB:
1919  {
1920  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
1921  break;
1922  }
1923  case RL_RF_AE_ESMFAULT_SB:
1924  {
1925  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
1926  break;
1927  }
1928  case RL_RF_AE_ANALOG_FAULT_SB:
1929  {
1930  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
1931  break;
1932  }
1933  case RL_RF_AE_INITCALIBSTATUS_SB:
1934  {
1935  rlRfInitComplete_t* ptrRFInitCompleteMessage;
1936  uint32_t calibrationStatus;
1937 
1938  /* Get the RF-Init completion message: */
1939  ptrRFInitCompleteMessage = (rlRfInitComplete_t*)payload;
1940  calibrationStatus = ptrRFInitCompleteMessage->calibStatus & 0xFFFU;
1941 
1942  /* Display the calibration status: */
1943  CLI_write ("Debug: Init Calibration Status = 0x%x\n", calibrationStatus);
1944  break;
1945  }
1946  case RL_RF_AE_FRAME_TRIGGER_RDY_SB:
1947  {
1948  gMmwMCB.stats.frameTriggerReady++;
1949  break;
1950  }
1951  case RL_RF_AE_MON_TIMING_FAIL_REPORT_SB:
1952  {
1953  gMmwMCB.stats.failedTimingReports++;
1954  break;
1955  }
1956  case RL_RF_AE_RUN_TIME_CALIB_REPORT_SB:
1957  {
1958  gMmwMCB.stats.calibrationReports++;
1959  break;
1960  }
1961  case RL_RF_AE_FRAME_END_SB:
1962  {
1963  gMmwMCB.stats.sensorStopped++;
1964 
1965  /*Received Frame Stop async event from BSS. Post event to sensor management task.*/
1966  MmwDemo_notifyBssSensorStop();
1967  break;
1968  }
1969  default:
1970  {
1971  System_printf ("Error: Asynchronous Event SB Id %d not handled\n", asyncSB);
1972  break;
1973  }
1974  }
1975  break;
1976  }
1977  default:
1978  {
1979  System_printf ("Error: Asynchronous message %d is NOT handled\n", msgId);
1980  break;
1981  }
1982  }
1983  return 0;
1984 }
1985 
1995 /*Unverified code. Conflicts with data path processing and should not be used.*/
1996 void MmwDemo_transferLVDSUserData(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *dataPathObj)
1997 {
1998  int32_t errCode;
1999 
2000  /* Delete previous SW session if it exists. SW session is being
2001  reconfigured every frame because number of detected objects
2002  may change from frame to frame which implies that the size of
2003  the streamed data may change. */
2004  if(gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.swSessionHandle != NULL)
2005  {
2006  MmwDemo_LVDSStreamDeleteSwSession(gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.swSessionHandle);
2007  }
2008 
2009  /* Configure SW session for this subframe */
2010  if (MmwDemo_LVDSStreamSwConfig(dataPathObj) < 0)
2011  {
2012  //System_printf("Failed LVDS stream SW configuration\n");
2013  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
2014  return;
2015  }
2016 
2017  /* Populate user data header that will be streamed out*/
2018  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.userDataHeader.frameNum = dataPathObj->frameStartIntCounter;
2019  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.userDataHeader.detObjNum = dataPathObj->numObjOut;
2020  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.userDataHeader.reserved = 0xABCD;
2021 
2022  /* If SW LVDS stream is enabled, start the session here. User data will imediatelly
2023  start to stream over LVDS.*/
2024  if(CBUFF_activateSession (gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.swSessionHandle, &errCode) < 0)
2025  {
2026  //System_printf("Failed to activate CBUFF session for LVDS stream SW. errCode=%d\n",errCode);
2027  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
2028  return;
2029  }
2030 }
2031 
2041 void MmwDemo_dataPathTask(UArg arg0, UArg arg1)
2042 {
2043  MmwDemo_DataPathObj *dataPathObj = &gMmwMCB.dataPathObj;
2044  uint16_t numDetectedObjects;
2045  uint32_t startTime, transmitOutStartTime;
2046  uint32_t txOrder[SYS_COMMON_NUM_TX_ANTENNAS] = {0,2,1};
2047  while(1)
2048  {
2049  Semaphore_pend(dataPathObj->frameStart_semHandle, BIOS_WAIT_FOREVER);
2050 
2051  Load_update();
2052  dataPathObj->timingInfo.interFrameCPULoad=Load_getCPULoad();
2053 
2054  MmwDemo_dataPathWait1D(dataPathObj);
2055  /* 1st Dimension FFT done! */
2056 
2057  Load_update();
2058  dataPathObj->timingInfo.activeFrameCPULoad=Load_getCPULoad();
2059 
2060  startTime = Pmu_getCount(0);
2061 
2062  if(dataPathObj->cliCfg->calibDcRangeSigCfg.enabled)
2063  {
2064  if (dataPathObj->cliCfg->calibDcRangeSigCfg.numAvgChirps < dataPathObj->numDopplerBins)
2065  {
2066  dataPathObj->cliCfg->calibDcRangeSigCfg.enabled = 0;
2067  dataPathObj->dcRangeForcedDisableCntr++;
2068  }
2069  else
2070  {
2071  MmwDemo_dcRangeSignatureCompensation(dataPathObj);
2072  }
2073  }
2074 
2075  /* Clutter removal */
2076  if (dataPathObj->cliCfg->clutterRemovalCfg.enabled)
2077  {
2078  int32_t rngIdx, antIdx, dopIdx;
2079  cmplx16ImRe_t *fftOut1D = (cmplx16ImRe_t *) dataPathObj->radarCube;
2080  cmplx32ImRe_t meanVal;
2081 
2082  for (rngIdx = 0; rngIdx < dataPathObj->numRangeBins; rngIdx++)
2083  {
2084  for (antIdx = 0; antIdx < dataPathObj->numVirtualAntennas; antIdx++)
2085  {
2086  meanVal.real = 0;
2087  meanVal.imag = 0;
2088  for (dopIdx = 0; dopIdx < dataPathObj->numDopplerBins; dopIdx++)
2089  {
2090  meanVal.real += fftOut1D[rngIdx*(dataPathObj->numDopplerBins*dataPathObj->numVirtualAntennas) +
2091  antIdx + dopIdx*(dataPathObj->numVirtualAntennas)].real;
2092  meanVal.imag += fftOut1D[rngIdx*(dataPathObj->numDopplerBins*dataPathObj->numVirtualAntennas) +
2093  antIdx + dopIdx*(dataPathObj->numVirtualAntennas)].imag;
2094  }
2095  meanVal.real = meanVal.real/dataPathObj->numDopplerBins;
2096  meanVal.imag = meanVal.imag/dataPathObj->numDopplerBins;
2097  for (dopIdx = 0; dopIdx < dataPathObj->numDopplerBins; dopIdx++)
2098  {
2099  fftOut1D[rngIdx*(dataPathObj->numDopplerBins*dataPathObj->numVirtualAntennas) +
2100  antIdx + dopIdx*(dataPathObj->numVirtualAntennas)].real -= meanVal.real;
2101  fftOut1D[rngIdx*(dataPathObj->numDopplerBins*dataPathObj->numVirtualAntennas) +
2102  antIdx + dopIdx*(dataPathObj->numVirtualAntennas)].imag -= meanVal.imag;
2103  }
2104  }
2105  }
2106  }
2107 
2108  MmwDemo_process2D(dataPathObj);
2109  /* 2nd Dimension FFT done! */
2110 
2111  /* Procedure for range bias measurement and Rx channels gain/phase offset measurement */
2112  if(dataPathObj->cliCommonCfg->measureRxChanCfg.enabled)
2113  {
2114  MmwDemo_rangeBiasRxChPhaseMeasure(
2115  dataPathObj->cliCommonCfg->measureRxChanCfg.targetDistance,
2116  dataPathObj->rangeResolution,
2117  dataPathObj->cliCommonCfg->measureRxChanCfg.searchWinSize,
2118  dataPathObj->rangeDopplerLogMagMatrix,
2119  dataPathObj->numDopplerBins,
2120  dataPathObj->numVirtualAntennas,
2121  dataPathObj->numVirtualAntennas * dataPathObj->numDopplerBins,
2122  dataPathObj->radarCube,
2123  dataPathObj->numRxAntennas,
2124  dataPathObj->numTxAntennas,
2125  txOrder,
2126  &dataPathObj->cliCommonCfg->compRxChanCfg);
2127 
2128  }
2129 
2130  MmwDemo_processCfar(dataPathObj, &numDetectedObjects);
2131  /* CFAR done! */
2132 
2133  /* Postprocessing/angle estimation */
2134  dataPathObj->numHwaCfarDetections = numDetectedObjects;
2135  MmwDemo_processAngle(dataPathObj);
2136 
2137  /* Calculate noise floor. This is for EVM diagnostics only. Assumes a stationary scene */
2138  dataPathObj->noiseEnergy = calcNoiseFloor (dataPathObj->radarCube, dataPathObj->numDopplerBins,
2139  dataPathObj->numRangeBins, dataPathObj->numVirtualAntennas);
2140 
2141  transmitOutStartTime = Pmu_getCount(0);
2142 
2143  /* Sending range bias and Rx channel phase offset measurements to MSS and from there to CLI */
2144  if(dataPathObj->cliCommonCfg->measureRxChanCfg.enabled)
2145  {
2146  MmwDemo_measurementResultOutput (dataPathObj);
2147  }
2148 
2149  /* Send user data over LVDS */
2150  /*Unverified code. Conflicts with data path processing and should not be used.*/
2151  if(dataPathObj->cliCfg->lvdsStreamCfg.isSwEnabled == 1)
2152  {
2153  MmwDemo_transferLVDSUserData(dataPathObj);
2154  }
2155 
2156  MmwDemo_transmitProcessedOutput(gMmwMCB.loggingUartHandle,
2157  dataPathObj);
2158 
2159  dataPathObj->timingInfo.transmitOutputCycles = Pmu_getCount(0) - transmitOutStartTime;
2160 
2161  /* Processing cycles for 2D, CFAR, Azimuth/Elevation
2162  processing excluding sending out data */
2163  dataPathObj->timingInfo.interFrameProcessingEndTime = Pmu_getCount(0);
2164  dataPathObj->timingInfo.interFrameProcCycles = dataPathObj->timingInfo.interFrameProcessingEndTime - startTime -
2165  dataPathObj->timingInfo.transmitOutputCycles;
2166 
2167  dataPathObj->interFrameProcToken--;
2168  if(dataPathObj->datapathStopped == true)
2169  {
2170  MmwDemo_notifyDathPathStop();
2171  }
2172  else
2173  {
2174  /* Prepare for next frame */
2175  MmwDemo_config1D_HWA(dataPathObj);
2176  MmwDemo_dataPathTrigger1D(dataPathObj);
2177  }
2178  }
2179 }
2180 
2181 
2190 static void MmwDemo_frameStartIntHandler(uintptr_t arg)
2191 {
2192  MmwDemo_DataPathObj * dpObj = &gMmwMCB.dataPathObj;
2193 
2194  /* Increment interrupt counter for debugging purpose */
2195  dpObj->frameStartIntCounter++;
2196 
2197  /* Note: this is valid after the first frame */
2198  dpObj->timingInfo.interFrameProcessingEndMargin =
2199  Pmu_getCount(0) - dpObj->timingInfo.interFrameProcessingEndTime;
2200 
2201  /* Check if previous chirp processing has completed */
2202  MmwDemo_debugAssert(dpObj->interFrameProcToken == 0);
2203  dpObj->interFrameProcToken++;
2204 
2205  Semaphore_post(dpObj->frameStart_semHandle);
2206 
2207 }
2208 
2209 
2219 void MmwDemo_initTask(UArg arg0, UArg arg1)
2220 {
2221  int32_t errCode;
2222  MMWave_InitCfg initCfg;
2223  UART_Params uartParams;
2224  Task_Params taskParams;
2225 
2226  /* Debug Message: */
2227  System_printf("Debug: Launched the Initialization Task\n");
2228 
2229  /*****************************************************************************
2230  * Initialize the mmWave SDK components:
2231  *****************************************************************************/
2232 
2233  /* Initialize the UART */
2234  UART_init();
2235 
2236  /* Initialize the Mailbox */
2237  Mailbox_init(MAILBOX_TYPE_MSS);
2238 
2239  /* Initialize the GPIO */
2240  GPIO_init ();
2241 
2242  /* Initialize the Data Path: */
2243  MmwDemo_dataPathInit(&gMmwMCB.dataPathObj);
2244 
2245  /*****************************************************************************
2246  * Open & configure the drivers:
2247  *****************************************************************************/
2248 
2249  /* Setup the PINMUX to bring out the UART-1 */
2250  Pinmux_Set_OverrideCtrl(SOC_XWR14XX_PINN6_PADBE, PINMUX_OUTEN_RETAIN_HW_CTRL, PINMUX_INPEN_RETAIN_HW_CTRL);
2251  Pinmux_Set_FuncSel(SOC_XWR14XX_PINN6_PADBE, SOC_XWR14XX_PINN6_PADBE_MSS_UARTA_TX);
2252  Pinmux_Set_OverrideCtrl(SOC_XWR14XX_PINN5_PADBD, PINMUX_OUTEN_RETAIN_HW_CTRL, PINMUX_INPEN_RETAIN_HW_CTRL);
2253  Pinmux_Set_FuncSel(SOC_XWR14XX_PINN5_PADBD, SOC_XWR14XX_PINN5_PADBD_MSS_UARTA_RX);
2254 
2255  /* Setup the default UART Parameters */
2256  UART_Params_init(&uartParams);
2257  uartParams.clockFrequency = gMmwMCB.cfg.sysClockFrequency;
2258  uartParams.baudRate = gMmwMCB.cfg.commandBaudRate;
2259  uartParams.isPinMuxDone = 1;
2260 
2261  /* Open the UART Instance */
2262  gMmwMCB.commandUartHandle = UART_open(0, &uartParams);
2263  if (gMmwMCB.commandUartHandle == NULL)
2264  {
2265  //System_printf("Error: Unable to open the Command UART Instance\n");
2266  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
2267  return;
2268  }
2269  //System_printf("Debug: UART Instance %p has been opened successfully\n", gMmwMCB.commandUartHandle);
2270 
2271  /* Setup the default UART Parameters */
2272  UART_Params_init(&uartParams);
2273  uartParams.writeDataMode = UART_DATA_BINARY;
2274  uartParams.readDataMode = UART_DATA_BINARY;
2275  uartParams.clockFrequency = gMmwMCB.cfg.sysClockFrequency;
2276  uartParams.baudRate = gMmwMCB.cfg.loggingBaudRate;
2277  uartParams.isPinMuxDone = 0;
2278 
2279  /* Open the Logging UART Instance: */
2280  gMmwMCB.loggingUartHandle = UART_open(1, &uartParams);
2281  if (gMmwMCB.loggingUartHandle == NULL)
2282  {
2283  //System_printf("Error: Unable to open the Logging UART Instance\n");
2284  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
2285  return;
2286  }
2287  //System_printf("Debug: UART Instance %p has been opened successfully\n", gMmwMCB.loggingUartHandle);
2288 
2289  /* Initialize LVDS streaming components */
2290  /*Unverified code. Conflicts with data path processing and should not be used.*/
2291  if ((errCode = MmwDemo_LVDSStreamInit()) < 0 )
2292  {
2293  //System_printf ("Error: MMWDemoDSS LVDS stream init failed with Error[%d]\n",errCode);
2294  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
2295  return;
2296  }
2297 
2298  /*****************************************************************************
2299  * mmWave: Initialization of the high level module
2300  *****************************************************************************/
2301 
2302  /* Initialize the mmWave control init configuration */
2303  memset ((void*)&initCfg, 0 , sizeof(MMWave_InitCfg));
2304 
2305  /* Populate the init configuration: */
2306  initCfg.domain = MMWave_Domain_MSS;
2307  initCfg.socHandle = gMmwMCB.socHandle;
2308  initCfg.eventFxn = MmwDemo_eventCallbackFxn;
2309  initCfg.linkCRCCfg.useCRCDriver = 1U;
2310  initCfg.linkCRCCfg.crcChannel = CRC_Channel_CH1;
2311  initCfg.cfgMode = MMWave_ConfigurationMode_FULL;
2312 
2313  /* Initialize and setup the mmWave Control module */
2314  gMmwMCB.ctrlHandle = MMWave_init (&initCfg, &errCode);
2315  if (gMmwMCB.ctrlHandle == NULL)
2316  {
2317  /* Error: Unable to initialize the mmWave control module */
2318  //System_printf ("Error: mmWave Control Initialization failed [Error code %d]\n", errCode);
2319  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
2320  return;
2321  }
2322  //System_printf ("Debug: mmWave Control Initialization was successful\n");
2323 
2324  /* Synchronization: This will synchronize the execution of the control module
2325  * between the domains. This is a prerequiste and always needs to be invoked. */
2326  if (MMWave_sync (gMmwMCB.ctrlHandle, &errCode) < 0)
2327  {
2328  /* Error: Unable to synchronize the mmWave control module */
2329  //System_printf ("Error: mmWave Control Synchronization failed [Error code %d]\n", errCode);
2330  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
2331  return;
2332  }
2333  //System_printf ("Debug: mmWave Control Synchronization was successful\n");
2334 
2335  MmwDemo_dataPathOpen(&gMmwMCB.dataPathObj);
2336 
2337  /* Configure banchmark counter */
2338  Pmu_configureCounter(0, 0x11, FALSE);
2339  Pmu_startCounter(0);
2340 
2341  /*****************************************************************************
2342  * Launch the mmWave control execution task
2343  * - This should have a higher priroity than any other task which uses the
2344  * mmWave control API
2345  *****************************************************************************/
2346  Task_Params_init(&taskParams);
2347  taskParams.priority = 5;
2348  taskParams.stackSize = 3*1024;
2349  Task_create(MmwDemo_mmWaveCtrlTask, &taskParams, NULL);
2350 
2351  /*****************************************************************************
2352  * Initialize the CLI Module:
2353  *****************************************************************************/
2354  MmwDemo_CLIInit();
2355 
2356  /*****************************************************************************
2357  * Initialize the Sensor Management Module:
2358  *****************************************************************************/
2359  if (MmwDemo_sensorMgmtInit() < 0)
2360  return;
2361 
2362  /* Register Frame start interrupt handler */
2363  {
2364  SOC_SysIntListenerCfg socIntCfg;
2365  int32_t errCode;
2366 
2367  Semaphore_Params semParams;
2368 
2369  /* Register frame start interrupt listener */
2370  socIntCfg.systemInterrupt = SOC_XWR14XX_DSS_FRAME_START_IRQ;
2371  socIntCfg.listenerFxn = MmwDemo_frameStartIntHandler;
2372  socIntCfg.arg = (uintptr_t)NULL;
2373  if (SOC_registerSysIntListener(gMmwMCB.socHandle, &socIntCfg, &errCode) == NULL)
2374  {
2375  //System_printf("Error: Unable to register frame start interrupt listener , error = %d\n", errCode);
2376  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
2377  return;
2378  }
2379 
2380  Semaphore_Params_init(&semParams);
2381  semParams.mode = Semaphore_Mode_BINARY;
2382  gMmwMCB.dataPathObj.frameStart_semHandle = Semaphore_create(0, &semParams, NULL);
2383  }
2384 
2385  /*****************************************************************************
2386  * Launch the Main task
2387  * - The main demo task
2388  *****************************************************************************/
2389  Task_Params_init(&taskParams);
2390  taskParams.priority = 4;
2391  taskParams.stackSize = 3*1024;
2392  Task_create(MmwDemo_dataPathTask, &taskParams, NULL);
2393 
2394  return;
2395 }

2408 void MmwDemo_sleep(void)
2409 {
2410  /* issue WFI (Wait For Interrupt) instruction */
2411  asm(" WFI ");
2412 }
2413 
2422 int main (void)
2423 {
2424  Task_Params taskParams;
2425  int32_t errCode;
2426  SOC_Handle socHandle;
2427  SOC_Cfg socCfg;
2428 
2429  /* Initialize the ESM: Dont clear errors as TI RTOS does it */
2430  ESM_init(0U);
2431 
2432  /* Initialize the SOC confiugration: */
2433  memset ((void *)&socCfg, 0, sizeof(SOC_Cfg));
2434 
2435  /* Populate the SOC configuration: */
2436  socCfg.clockCfg = SOC_SysClock_INIT;
2437 
2438  /* Initialize the SOC Module: This is done as soon as the application is started
2439  * to ensure that the MPU is correctly configured. */
2440  socHandle = SOC_init (&socCfg, &errCode);
2441  if (socHandle == NULL)
2442  {
2443  //System_printf ("Error: SOC Module Initialization failed [Error code %d]\n", errCode);
2444  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
2445  return -1;
2446  }
2447 
2448  /* Initialize and populate the demo MCB */
2449  memset ((void*)&gMmwMCB, 0, sizeof(MmwDemo_MCB));
2450 
2451  gMmwMCB.socHandle = socHandle;
2452 
2453  /* Initialize the DEMO configuration: */
2454  gMmwMCB.cfg.sysClockFrequency = (200 * 1000000);
2455  gMmwMCB.cfg.loggingBaudRate = 921600;
2456  gMmwMCB.cfg.commandBaudRate = 115200;
2457 
2458 #if 0
2459  /* Debug Message: */
2460  System_printf ("**********************************************\n");
2461  System_printf ("Debug: Launching the Millimeter Wave Demo\n");
2462  System_printf ("**********************************************\n");
2463 #endif
2464 
2465  /* Initialize the Task Parameters. */
2466  Task_Params_init(&taskParams);
2467  Task_create(MmwDemo_initTask, &taskParams, NULL);
2468 
2469  /* Start BIOS */
2470  BIOS_start();
2471  return 0;
2472 }
